channel.title: Uskaarj Editing and Coding Forum
channel.description: Love to make custom maps, models, music and more? Then come inside and show us what you got!

item.title: Genius!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Ravenhearte)
item.dc:creator: Ravenhearte
item.content:encoded:
Sorry, but sometimes I amaze myself. I've spent the last week since I got out of the hospital pondering how I'm going to tackle the problem of getting the neg turret to fire two projectiles at once. I kept trying to figure out how I could calculte which direction along x and y was left for any given rotation. Finally, with a little help from the math section at unrealwiki, it hit me. why try to go forward and to either side when i can go diagonally? Problem solved! I take my current...

Genius!
